title: Playing a Champion I don't main in Ranked
body: Is it bannable to play ranked with a champion I'm not particulary good at?

replies.body: Not really, as long as you're doing your best and not trying to grief others.  It'll help a lot, though, to broaden your pool of champion experiences so you can be prepared for anything!
It isn't, but prefer if you do not play champions you're not that strong with in ranked, and practice them in Normal games.
